games.title: Orb Hunter
games.subtitle: Epic Games VR JAM, Stuttgart FMX
games.description:
The winning game made in 4 days at FMX, Germany - "Epic Games VRJam" - 2016

- VRFocus

read more

REQUIRES 'OCULUS RIFT DK2'. Orb Hunter has been developed by 'Lex Brouwers', 'Frank Hartman' and I 'Ryan van den Bogaard' is the winning product of the Virtual Reality GameJam ("What moves you?") hosted by Epic Games at FMX (Stuttgart) in the mids of Spring 2016. Within a weeks time we had to learn and create a Unreal Engine 4 Game that would work with the Oculus DK2. In our game you do not need any controllers other than to own a Head-mounted Display. Our mechanic for executing movement is teleportation once you look down and basic body positioning with the tracking capabilities of the Oculus DK2s Infrared Camera.
